items.title: The Shawshank Redemption
items.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

items.title: The Godfather
items.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

items.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
items.description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom.

items.title: Fight Club
items.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much more.

items.title: The Matrix
items.description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

items.title: Interstellar
items.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

items.title: The Green Mile
items.description: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.
